description: Result audit information for verification and unverification (result correction).

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RES_SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: Internal specimen identifier associated with result

columns.name: RES_VLD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result validation status category number for the audit trail validation status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Preliminary


Final


Prelim Pend


Final Pend


Unverified


Cosign


Prelim Wait


Final Wait

columns.name: RES_UNVLD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result correction reason category number for the result correction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RES_VLD_USER
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: RES_VLD_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant when the result is validated.

columns.name: RES_UNVLD_RSN_COM
columns.description:
Unvalidation reason comment


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RES_UNVLD_RSN_C_NAME

columns.name: RES_UNVLD_RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the validation audit result record that is associated with this result record.
